items.sentence: How did Tom know he was supposed to be here today?
I asked Tom if he knew anyone who taught swimming.
I asked Tom to lend me some money, but he refused.
You don\'t have to tell Tom twice to do something.
When did you start going out with your girlfriend?
Where are you going to spend your summer vacation?
Tom must be aware that Mary is John\'s girlfriend.
I\'ve changed. I\'m not the same man I used to be.
I wish you\'d consider coming back to work for us.
Tom didn\'t anticipate that it would be a problem.
